name: Minecraft Dungeons
description: IMPORTANT: Closed beta access is needed for now.
notes:
This installs the launcher for the game. The game itself needs to be downloaded afterwards.

Keep the installation directory as is.
content:
files:
- installer: https://launcher.mojang.com/download/MinecraftDungeonsInstaller.msi
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Minecraft Dungeons Launcher/MinecraftDungeonsLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
